column1: Local Foods////This place is perfect for a post-family dinner
column3: post celebration/holiday detox (unless you're from a vegan family or attended a vegan party). A bunch of girls and I went to Local Foods to give our bodies a much needed treat after a heavy
column5: and fattening Thanksgiving meal. I really liked the food. I had a Vegetarian Winter Bisque and a Falafel Sandwich. It was all delicious
column6: so why only 3 stars? I felt as if the food won! I know the food is really good for me
column9: but I couldn't finish it! I took it home for lunch tomorrow
column10: but I really wanted to devour it like I would a burger.
